alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 9:14AM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Deer Park, Metaline, Fruitland, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Eastport, Tiger, Springdale-Hunters Road, Ione, Sandpoint, Bonners Ferry, Colville, Priest River, Newport, Metaline Falls, Clark Fork, Chewelah, Athol, Orin-Rice Road, Flowery Trail Road, Kettle Falls, and Northport. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
